answers.answer: Yes... Prenatal care is VERY important

How do they check if you are getting enough of everything for the baby? And making sure you are okay? I have never heard of people not getting the pre natal care. I couldnt imagine not going to my Dr they always have so much for me. Test and just generally making sure baby is okay..

^^^ agreed!! It's VERY important to get medical attention when you're pregnant. There's so much they do within the 9 months. If it's insurance problems, get Medicaid! I have that and I don't pay for anything. I hope you plan on getting a doc for the baby :/

Um. No I dont think its good you havent been to a dr yet.. They do scans to check for deformalities. Do blood test to make sure you wont pass any infections to baby. make sure you dont have diabetes.  Make sure baby is healthy. Please go to the dr.

question: Is it a bad thing is that this whole pregnancy so far I haven't gone to the doctors. I have been to the er a few times but never a doctor. I am 30 weeks and 2 days but my baby is fine. I haven't been to the doctors once since I found out.
title: haven't gone
